content:
Let's add the online meetings to the template.

**Morning Routine (6:30 AM - 8:30 AM)**

* 6:30 AM - Wake Up
* 6:45 AM - [Insert Morning Stretching/Exercise Routine]
* 7:00 AM - [Insert Hygiene Routine (shower, brush teeth, etc.)]
* 7:20 AM - [Insert Breakfast Routine]
* 7:40 AM - **Yoga Class (7:40 AM - 8:20 AM)**
* 8:20 AM - [Insert Morning Task 1 (e.g., meditation, journaling, reading)]
* 8:30 AM - [Insert Morning Task 2 (e.g., check emails, plan out day)]

**Work/School Routine (8:30 AM - 5:00 PM)**

* 8:30 AM - Start Work/School
* **Lunch Break (12:00 PM - 1:00 PM)**
* **Tuesday and Thursday: Online Meeting (2:00 PM - 3:00 PM)**
* [Insert Break Times (e.g., coffee breaks)]
* 5:00 PM - Finish Work/School

**Evening Routine (5:00 PM - 9:00 PM)**

* 5:00 PM - [Insert Commute/Travel Time]
* 5:30 PM - [Insert Relaxation Time (e.g., walk, listen to music)]
* 6:00 PM - [Insert Dinner Routine]
* 7:00 PM - [Insert Evening Task 1 (e.g., exercise, hobby)]
* 8:00 PM - [Insert Evening Task 2 (e.g., spend time with family/friends, learn a new skill)]

**Wind Down Routine (9:00 PM - 10:00 PM)**

* 9:00 PM - [Insert Wind Down Activity (e.g., reading, relaxation techniques)]
* 10:00 PM - Prepare for Bed

**Reminders**

* Set reminders for:
	+ Yoga class (7:40 AM)
	+ Lunch break (12:00 PM)
	+ Online meeting (Tuesdays and Thursdays, 2:00 PM)
	+ Morning tasks (e.g., exercise, meditation)
	+ Work/School tasks (e.g., meetings, deadlines)
	+ Evening tasks (e.g., exercise, hobby)
	+ Wind down routine (e.g., start winding down at 9:00 PM)

I've added the online meeting to the template, specifying that it occurs on Tuesdays and Thursdays from 2:00 PM to 3:00 PM. You can adjust the template as needed to fit your other tasks and activities.

Remember to set reminders for your online meetings to ensure you don't miss them!
